headline: A ‘Crippling’ Winter Storm is Coming. Utilities Are at Risk.
summary: For utilities and power plant owners, storms of this magnitude can lead to large financial losses, Jefferies analyst Julien Dumoulin-Smith says. Data centers are making the power crunch even more acute.

headline: PJM cost concerns bleed into transmission planning
summary: A proposed $1.7-billion, 765-kV power line across central Pennsylvania by NextEra Energy and Exelon could become the “poster child” for overbuilding new transmission infrastructure, according to that state’s ratepayer advocate.
